jsonld.name: Conversation Reset Blindness
jsonld.description: The inability of a session-bound AI to recognize when a user is attempting to resume a previous conversation after an interruption or break. Each new interaction is processed as a novel, isolated event, blind to the historical thread the user is consciously continuing.
